Event/Development: As We May Think essay published
Checkers program with early ML concepts
Term "artificial intelligence" coined; Logic Theorist program
Shakey robot with NLP, vision, reasoning

Event/Development: "Attention, Intentions, and the Structure of Discourse"
DART supply chain tool used in Gulf War
Robot car drives 1000 miles Munich to Copenhagen
Deep Blue defeats Garry Kasparov in chess

iRobot Roomba autonomous floor cleaning robot
DARPA Grand Challenge for autonomous vehicles
Blue Brain project to simulate brain
GPUs used to implement neural networks
Geoffrey Hinton's foundational deep learning papers
Open Advancement of Question Answering (OAQA) initiative
ImageNet database of human-tagged images unveiled
IBM's Watson defeats humans on Jeopardy!

People/Organizations: Alex Krizhevsky, Ilya Sutskever, Geoffrey Hinton

Event/Development: ImageNet breakthrough marks beginning of deep learning era
Generative Adversarial Neural Networks (GANs) introduced, revolutionary architecture
AlphaGo beats professional Go player on full 19x19 board
Google self-driving car crosses 1 million miles driven
Deep reinforcement learning paper in Nature (Atari games, DQN)
PyTorch and TensorFlow key development frameworks
"Attention is all you need" paper introduces Transformers
People/Organizations: Vaswani et al. (Google Brain, Google Research)

GPT-2 released (1.5B parameters); concerns about misuse
BERT becomes widely adopted for NLP tasks
DeepMind's AlphaStar reaches Grandmaster level in StarCraft II
Tesla AI Day showcases Dojo supercomputer
ChatGPT launched (November 30) - fastest growing consumer app
Galactica (science-focused LLM) released and quickly withdrawn
Adobe Firefly (generative AI for creative tools)
Code Interpreter (Advanced Data Analysis) for ChatGPT
Sam Altman fired and rehired from OpenAI (November)
Mamba: Linear-Time Sequence Modeling with Selective State Spaces

Figure 01 humanoid robot with ChatGPT integration
